description: FORMATION OF CUSTOMER CAR PARKING AREA FOR EXISTING RETAIL SUPERMARKET INVOLVING DEMOLITION OF REDUNDANT DAIRY BUILDINGS.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.  Reason for condition: To comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - A tree planting/landscaping scheme which includes full details of species, size of plants and spacing shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval and be implemented during the next planting season after the completion of building operations on the site, or within any such longer period as may be agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority. The Council will require a maintenance period of three years during which dead, dying or defective trees, shrubs and ground cover must be replaced.  Reason for condition: To enhance and maintain the visual amenities and character of the locality.

Condition : 3 - The rear boundary wall shall be reduced in height to match the height of the existing rear boundary wall and made good to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: To preserve and enhance the visual amenities of the locality.

Condition : 4 - Details of the materials to be used for the surface of the car park shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority before any work is commenced.  Reason for condition: To ensure a satisfactory appearance for the development.

Condition : 5 - No demolition or construction work in pursuance of this permission shall be carried on before 0800 or after 1800 on Mondays to Fridays inclusive, before 0800 or after 1300 on Saturdays, and at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.  Reason for condition: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 6 - Details of a lighting scheme within the customer car parking area shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to the development commencing.  Reason: In the interests of security and safety.

Condition : 7 - Prior to the demolition of any buildings or structures on the site you should seek the view of the Local Planning Authority to establish whether you require prior demolition approval in accordance with the Town and Country (Demolition-Description of Buildings)(No.2) Direction 1992.

Condition : 8 - Details of the proposed cycle racking shall be agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before work is commenced.  Reason for condition: To ensure adequate parking facilities for cyclists.
